meanings.definition: A type of paperboard used for making boxes and packaging.
meanings.sent1: The factory ordered a large shipment of linerboards to create sturdy boxes for shipping products.
meanings.sent2: The company purchased high-quality linerboards to ensure the safety of fragile items during transportation.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat found the stack of linerboards and turned them into a cozy nap spot.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were like linerboards, providing a solid foundation for the project to take shape.
meanings.sent5: The sun reflected off the glossy surface of the linerboards, making them gleam like polished metal.

meanings.definition: Sheets of paperboard used as a protective layer inside containers.
meanings.sent1: The fragile glassware was carefully wrapped in linerboards before being placed in the box.
meanings.sent2: The movers used linerboards to cushion the delicate items inside the moving truck.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat peeked out from behind the linerboards, thinking it was invisible.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was muffled by the linerboards, creating a sense of mystery in the room.
meanings.sent5: The scent of fresh pine wafted from the linerboards, adding a pleasant aroma to the storage space.

meanings.definition: The material used to line the inside of shipping containers.
meanings.sent1: The workers carefully secured the fragile items with linerboards to prevent damage during transit.
meanings.sent2: The linerboards absorbed any moisture inside the container, keeping the goods dry and safe.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat peeked out from behind the linerboards, thinking it was invisible.
meanings.sent4: Her voice echoed against the walls lined with linerboards, creating a surreal effect.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of the linerboards stood out against the dull metal of the shipping container.
